Text:
Thanks again Cap!
The Peter Sellers movie Savage has refered to often is called Being There...his characters name is Chance the gardiner.....and is a great movie somewhat a comedy however a dark comedy in this situation.........of an unwitting man being used for others political gains (they don't make films like this anymore....to bad..they actually said something and gave you something to think about)

"Being There" 

I haven't seen that one in years and years.
